name: Helping Hand
description: Welcome to Helping Hand! A game about expressing yourself using only your left hand. What about your right hand, you say? Well thatâ€™s broken. As well as all the other bones and muscles in your body. Find out why and explore the different environments and character within this indie game!
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: core i3 (1.8GHz) Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: intel HD Graphics 4000 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Additional Notes: A keyboard that can take up to five inputs at the same time.
